characterList: 孤益假蝦氣汽飛面麵革鞋馨聲吳娛誤承

characters.story: The strokes unite to show orphan, singing "Goo!" cheerfully!
The water stands for a benefit, shouting "Yee!" sharply like ripples spreading across a pond!
Like a person, this character means vacation and shouts "Jyah!"!
Like a shellfish, this character means shrimp and asks "Shyah? Prawn?"!
An striking symbol for air that shouts "Chee!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!
The water stands for vapor, shouting "Chee!" sharply like ripples spreading across a pond!
"Fay!" Wings soared cheerfully - time to fly, going airborne!
A striking symbol for face-to-face that shouts "Myan!" sharply!
A striking symbol for noodles that shouts "Myan!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!
Picture leather taking form - it asks "Guh? Skin?" with vivid energy!
Like soil, this character means shoes and asks "Shyeh? Footwear?"!
The strokes unite to show fragrant, singing "Shin!" cheerfully!
The ear stands for voice, singing "Shung!" cheerfully - a vivid image to remember!
See how the mouth forms wu? It asks "Woo? Jiangsu?" curiously!
An striking symbol for amusement that asks "Yoo? Pleasure?" curiously!
This character represents error, shouting "Woo!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!
"Chung, can you bear it?" Hands questioned receiving curiously - ready to undertake and take charge!
